# VisualShaderNodeVectorBase

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [VisualShaderNodeFaceForward](VisualShaderNodeFaceForward.md), [VisualShaderNodeVectorCompose](VisualShaderNodeVectorCompose.md), [VisualShaderNodeVectorDecompose](VisualShaderNodeVectorDecompose.md), [VisualShaderNodeVectorDistance](VisualShaderNodeVectorDistance.md), [VisualShaderNodeVectorFunc](VisualShaderNodeVectorFunc.md), [VisualShaderNodeVectorLen](VisualShaderNodeVectorLen.md), [VisualShaderNodeVectorOp](VisualShaderNodeVectorOp.md), [VisualShaderNodeVectorRefract](VisualShaderNodeVectorRefract.md)

A base type for the nodes that perform vector operations within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This is an abstract class. See the derived types for descriptions of the possible operations.
